name: com.shadercrew.the-toon-shader.3d

samples.displayName: The Toon X STS Shader Examples(Requires STS Asset and Regular Toon Samples))
samples.description: Examples of The Toon Shader combined with STS

description:
Advanced toon shading for 3D projects in Unity, supporting both URP and BiRP render pipelines.
Delivers high-quality stylized rendering with cell shading, ramp shading, procedural hatching and halftones and robust lighting options.
